title: Three Bedroom House for Sale in Thalawathugoda
details:
Well designed family house conveniently located in Thalawathugoda off Pitakotte - Thalawathugoda Road, 450 meters from Japan Sri Lanka Friendship Road & 1 km from the Thalawathugoda Junction. The property is placed on a residential lane only 50 meters away from the main road, within close proximity to all modern day conveniences.

The two story house features a spacious living & dining area, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, TV lounge, separate pantry & wet kitchen. The property also offers covered parking for two vehicles and provision for a small garden around the house.

- Constructed c. 7 years ago.
- Three bedrooms. All bedrooms equipped with A/C.
- Two bathrooms equipped with solar powered hot water.
- Upstairs TV lounge equipped with A/C.
- Spacious living and dining area equipped with A/C.
- Separate pantry and wet kitchen both equipped with fitted cupboards.
- Separate maids room & bathroom.
- Covered parking for two vehicles.
- Furniture & appliances seen in the pictures are not included.

Price negotiable upon inspection.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.
